definitions: Of cloth or wool: dyed or coloured with woad (now chiefly historical). Of a person or human body: painted or adorned with blue body paint or dye made from woad; compare "woad" (now rare).

Designating a colour, especially black, that results from dyeing cloth or wool that has previously been dyed with woad; compare woading. Also: designating a dye which has a basis of woad or is made from woad. Now chiefly historical.
